languages.text: "Трусость — это прятаться под плащом Вольного Торговца, чтобы избежать заслуженного наказания".
"A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."
languages.original_text: "Трусость — это прятаться под плащом Вольного Торговца, чтобы избежать заслуженного наказания".

traits.locale_text: "A coward would hide under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid the deserved punishment."
"A coward would hide under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid the deserved punishment."
"A coward would hide under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

languages.text: 「臆病者なら、ローグトレーダーのマントの下に隠れて、正当な処罰を避けていたはずだ」
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「臆病者なら、ローグトレーダーのマントの下に隠れて、正当な処罰を避けていたはずだ」

languages.text: "Ein Feigling hätte sich unter dem Umhang {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} versteckt, um der rechtmäßigen Bestrafung zu entgehen."
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Feigling hätte sich unter dem Umhang {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} versteckt, um der rechtmäßigen Bestrafung zu entgehen."

languages.text: « Un lâche se serait caché sous la cape {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} pour éviter son juste châtiment. »
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: « Un lâche se serait caché sous la cape {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} pour éviter son juste châtiment. »

languages.text: «Un cobarde se ocultaría bajo las faldas de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente a fin de escapar a su merecido castigo».
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Un cobarde se ocultaría bajo las faldas de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente a fin de escapar a su merecido castigo».

languages.text: “真正的懦夫会躲在行商浪人的斗篷下，不敢面对他应得的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: “真正的懦夫会躲在行商浪人的斗篷下，不敢面对他应得的惩罚。”

languages.text: "Ancak bir korkak, Hür Tacir pelerini ardında hak ettiği cezadan kaçınır."
languages.original_text: "A coward would have hidden under the Rogue Trader's cloak to avoid his rightful punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak bir korkak Hür Tacir pelerini ardında hak ettiği cezadan kaçınır."
